unknowns_requests.request_title: VMware Cost Impact and Customer Pricing Response Analysis
information_requested: VMware licensing costs: FY2022, FY2023, FY2024, FY2025 budget showing Broadcom impact
Customer pricing actions: Which Private Cloud customers received price increases? What magnitude? When? Customer response (retention, churn, negotiation)?
Private Cloud margin decomposition: VMware cost as % of COGS, other vendor costs, personnel, facilities
Platform migration planning: Is Rackspace migrating customers off VMware? To what platforms? Timeline? Expected customer retention?
unknowns_requests.why_critical: VMware shock potentially destroys 40-50% of operating income (Private Cloud contribution). Need to know: (1) Actual cost magnitude ($100-210M estimate has wide range), (2) Management decision (absorb vs pass through), (3) Customer response (churn rate if passed through). Blocks Private Cloud viability assessment and overall profitability projection.
unknowns_requests.expected_availability: VMware costs in vendor agreements and accounting. Pricing decisions in management documentation. Customer response in retention reports. Should be available in diligence data room.

unknowns_requests.request_title: Hyperscaler Partnership Terms and Credit Economics
information_requested: AWS/Azure/Google partnership agreements: credit rates, volume tiers, modification terms, termination notice periods
Historical credit rate trends: Have credits been stable, increasing, decreasing?
Partnership health assessment: Is Rackspace strategic partner to hyperscalers? Any risk signals?
Public Cloud margin sensitivity: What happens to profitability if credits reduced 25%, 50%, 75%?
unknowns_requests.why_critical: Public Cloud (61% of revenue, $1,683M) viability depends on 5-15% partner credits. If reduced 50%, segment becomes unprofitable. Partnership terms proprietary (not publicly disclosed) creates critical unknown. Blocks Public Cloud risk assessment and scenario planning.
unknowns_requests.expected_availability: Partnership agreements likely confidential. May require specific requests to hyperscalers or Rackspace partnership teams. Sensitivity analysis should be available from financial planning.
